author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Pillars of Eternity trailer to see what to expect from the Turn-Based Mode Public Beta, live now on Steam and Xbox PC. The Pillars of Eternity Turn-Based Mode public beta launch trailer highlights features, including revised action economy, balanced free actions, faster combat, and the ability to switch between modes.

Step into the rich and mysterious world of Pillars of Eternity, where every decision you make shapes the world around you. Now, with the brand-new Turn-Based Mode, experience combat with a fresh tactical depth that puts you in complete control. Players can select Turn-Based Mode when starting a game or swap between real-time with pause and turn-based combat in the options menu. 

The Turn-Based combat system adds a new layer of strategy—master every move, exploit enemy weaknesses, and coordinate your companions to emerge victorious.
title: Pillars of Eternity - Official Turn-Based Mode Beta Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Hell awaits. Watch the final Keeper trailer for the upcoming horror film from Osgood Perkins. Keeper stars Tatiana Maslany and Rossif Sutherland. Keeper opens in theaters on November 14, 2025.

#IGN
title: Keeper - Official Final Trailer (2025) Tatiana Maslany

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Sony's PlayStatio Portal is officially getting game streaming over the cloud today. The feature was previously in beta, but is now available to all users, provided you have the right PlayStation Plus membership. Game streaming via the cloud does not require the PS Portal to be connected to a PS5 console. In related news, code and graphics for a 'cross-buy' option has been found on the PlayStation Store. Sony hasn't announced anything yet, so many are speculating that this could mean dual PS5/PC purchases. And finally, the highly-anticipated Terminator 2D: NO FATE has been delayed yet again, but this time only about two weeks. The game is now slated for December 12, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming #PS5
title: PlayStation Portal Officially Gets Cloud Gaming Today - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
The Root update for PEAK is available now on PC (Steam). Check out the latest PEAK Trailer for this co-op climbing game, where the slightest mistake can spell your doom. The new trailer shows some of the chaos you can expect with the Root update, which features a new biome. 

In PEAK, either solo or as a group of lost nature scouts, your only hope of rescue from a mysterious island is to scale the mountain at its center. Do you have what it takes to reach the PEAK?
title: PEAK - Official Roots Update Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 40th Anniversary Retrospective Feature for Naughty Dog, the renowned, legendary studio under PlayStation's first-party development team, established in 1984 as JAM Software and becoming Naughty Dog in 1989. Players can take a trip down memory lane to explore the studio's games from Crash Bandicoot and Jak and Daxter to Uncharted and The Last of Us. Hear from the people behind the games about the process of development and what lies ahead with Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet, coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Naughty Dog - Official 40th Anniversary Retrospective

author: IGN
description:
Walt Disney World has so many different ways to capture that magical moment and we didn’t even realize it. We were surprised with the “Capture Your Moment” private photo session that we did at Star Wars: Galaxy Edge. This experience is available at all four parks (Magic Kingdom, Hollywood Studios, EPCOT, Animal Kingdom). 
The team over at Disney’s PhotoPass have found some creative ways to capture those magical moments 
Capture Your Moment
Studio Shoot at Disney Springs 
Super Zoom
Mini World
Magic Shots
title: 5 Hidden Photo Opportunities at Disney World: PhotoPass

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'Stream On January 27' Trailer for Wonder Man, the next action-adventure superhero installment in the MCU distributed by Marvel Studios. 

Hollywood actor Simon Williams is thrust into the world of superheroes as he gets powers of his own, and becomes the new superhero Wonder Man.

Wonder Man stars Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Ben Kingsley, Demetrius Grosse, Lauren Glazier, Byron Bowers, and more. The series was created by Destin Daniel Cretton.

Wonder Man premieres January 27 at 6 PM PT only on Disney+

#IGN #WonderMan #MarvelCinematicUniverse
title: Marvel Studios' Wonder Man - Official 'Stream On January 27' Trailer (2026) Yahya Abdul-Mateen II

author: IGN
description:
One year from tonight!
Join V en masse to celebrate the revolutionary legacy in one of the most powerful political action thrillers of the 21st century, starring Huho Weaving as V and Natalie Portman as Evey Hammond.
Sign up now at Fathom Entertainment to be among the first notified when tickets go on sale in 2026 for the V for Vendetta 20th Anniversary celebration: https://hubs.la/Q03RJZ6f0
V for Vendetta is back in theaters on November 5, 2026.
title: V for Vendetta - 20th Anniversary Announcement Trailer (2026) Hugo Weaving, Natalie Portman

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'Behind the Characters' Trailer for Marvel Cosmic Invasion, a beat 'em up action game developed by Tribute Games. 

Hear straight from the developers on the process behind selecting the roster of Marvel heroes to be included in the game, taking into account legendary classics and lesser-known characters. 

Marvel Cosmic Invasion is launching on December 1 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #MarvelCosmicInvasion #DevDiary
title: Marvel Cosmic Invasion - Official 'Behind the Characters' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Once Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 trailer to see what to expect with the Character Pack No. 7, which features Lucci - CP0-, S-Snake, and Jewelry Bonney. 

One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch 2 on November 21, 2025, along with Character Pack No. 7: the Future Island Egghead Pack.

#IGN #OnePiece #OnePiecePirateWarriors4
title: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - DLC 7 & Next Gen Release Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Evercade trailer. Evercade is a physical retro gaming system, using officially licensed cartridge collections to play retro games, like Rare's Battletoads, Activision's Pitfall!, TAITO's Space Invaders, and over 650 more games across 75+ collections. 

You can play any Evercade cartridge on any Evercade device. Console games, arcade games, indie games, or home computer games playable on handheld, TV Console, or Bartop Arcade - this is retro gaming reimagined.

#IGN #Evercade #RetroGaming
title: Evercade - Official Retro Gaming Reimagined Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Zach and Emmy’s romantic retreat aboard a hot air balloon takes a terrifying turn when they are highjacked by a sinister third passenger with a link to Zach’s past. 

As the mystery of their secret relationship is revealed, their spectacular ride becomes a brutal mental chess match and a lethal battle high in the sky.

This psychological thriller is directed by Claudio Fäh from a screenplay by Andy Mayson and stars Hera Hilmar, Jeremy Irvine, Kelsey Grammer, and Olga Kurylenko. 

Turbulence arrives in theaters, On Demand and digital on December 12, 2025.
title: Turbulence - Exclusive Trailer (2025) Olga Kurylenko, Kelsey Grammer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the ‘Combat and Character Design’ Behind the Scenes Feature for Silent Hill f, the latest adventure horror game developed by Neobards Entertainment and Konami. 

Players can hear straight from developers at Neobards Entertainment, such as Associate Design Director Capra Shih and Art Director Box Shih, on the process and philosophy behind the game's unique blend of horror and intense combat. Silent Hill f is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#IGN #SilentHillF #Horror
title: Silent Hill f - Official ‘Combat and Character Design’ Behind the Scenes Feature

author: IGN
description:
Check out the ‘Guide to Waterfalls’ Overview Trailer for Jurassic World Evolution 3, the hit dinosaur park management simulation game developed by Frontier Developments. 

Players will get the rundown on how to manipulate the terrain to create waterfalls for the park. Get the full details for establishing waterfalls in Jurassic World Evolution 3, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #JurassicWorldEvolution3 #ParkSimulator
title: Jurassic World Evolution 3 - Official ‘Guide to Waterfalls’ Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Simpsons and about 37 years worth of history have made their way to Fortnite. And with a new map based on Springfield and some of the show's most iconic locations, there's a ton of cool stuff for fans to sink their teeth into. From call backs of the show's biggest moments, to some pretty obscure references and easter eggs to minor characters, background gags, and even references to the Arcade game, we’ve spent hours crawling around everyone's favorite fictional city and put together a montage of cool stuff to find. 

Gameplay captured on an Xbox Series X
title: 29 Easter Eggs Found In The Simpsons Fortnite Collaboration

author: IGN
description: Get your first look at Chicken Chicken, a new eight-player online multiplayer party game for PC and mobile in which everyone plays, as the name implies, as a chicken. You'll compete against your friends in racing cars, climbing mountains, catching flies, and more. A playable demo is now available on Steam. Check it out if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2922630?utm_source=IGN
title: Chicken Chicken – Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
When recently unemployed accountant Brian (Kevin James) agrees to a playdate with charismatic stay-at-home dad Jeff (Alan Ritchson) and their sons, he expects an easy afternoon of small talk and football tossing. 

Instead, he's thrust into a chaotic scramble to stay alive as they are pursued by a ruthless team of mercenaries. Brian stumbles through one ridiculous obstacle after another, his zero tactical skills a stark contrast to Jeff's oddly prepared demeanor. 

Directed by Luke Greenfield (Let's Be Cops, The Girl Next Door). Playdate releases globally on Prime Video on November 12, 2025.
title: Playdate - Exclusive Clip (2025) Kevin James, Alan Ritchson

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest 'Unmissable Games' It Happens on PS5 Trailer for PlayStation 5, the latest generation of gaming hardware developed by Sony. 

Players can experience it all on PS5, from exploring the regions around Mount Yotei in Ghost of Yotei, connecting a post-apocalyptic world once more in Death Stranding 2, to fighting in all-out warfare in Battlefield 6. PlayStation 5 is available now.

#IGN #PS5 #DeathStranding2
title: PlayStation 5 - Official 'Unmissable Games' It Happens on PS5 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
A new set of rules. A new level of fear. Watch the latest Five Nights at Freddy's 2 trailer for the upcoming horror movie sequel based on the game series by Scott Cawthon. Five Nights at Freddy's 2 stars Josh Hutcherson, Matthew Lillard, Elizabeth Lail, and Piper Rubio.

One year has passed since the supernatural nightmare at Freddy Fazbear’s Pizza. The stories about what transpired there have been twisted into a campy local legend, inspiring the town’s first ever Fazfest. 

Former security guard Mike (Josh Hutcherson) and police officer Vanessa (Elizabeth Lail) have kept the truth from Mike’s 11-year-old sister, Abby (Piper Rubio), concerning the fate of her animatronic friends. 

But when Abby sneaks out to reconnect with Freddy, Bonnie, Chica, and Foxy, it will set into motion a terrifying series of events, revealing dark secrets about the true origin of Freddy’s, and unleashing a long-forgotten horror hidden away for decades.

The cast of Five Nights at Freddy’s 2 includes returni
title: Five Nights at Freddy's 2 - Official Trailer 2 (2025) Josh Hutcherson, Matthew Lillard, Piper Rubio

author: IGN
description:
Xunhuan Li, the legendary hero from Gulong's wuxia universe, has stepped through the Rift and is now available in Naraka: Bladepoint!

Xunhuan Li is able to alter his body weight to allow him to move with high speed to dash through the air and run along the surface of water. Using his signature throwing knives, and high speed, Xunhuan Li will be the hero for you if you want fast paced action! 

Naraka: Bladepoint is out now for PC (Steam), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One and Xbox Series X|S

#IGN #NarakaBladepoint #XunhuanLi
title: Naraka: Bladepoint - Official Xunhuan Li Hero Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'Cloud Streaming for PS5 Games' Trailer for the PlayStation Portal, the remote streaming handheld device developed by Sony. 

Players can now access the full Cloud Streaming offering after the Beta release, with new additions and features included with a PlayStation Plus Premium subscription. Cloud Streaming now supports a wide range of select PS5 games, including select games in your Library, alongside 3D Audio being supported with Cloud Streaming as well. Cloud Streaming is available now on the PlayStation Portal.

#IGN #PlayStationPortal #PlayStation5
title: PlayStation Portal - Official 'Cloud Streaming for PS5 Games' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get your first proper look at gameplay – six minutes of it! – from Sleep Awake, an upcoming first-person psychedelic horror game set in the scary space between sleep and death, brought to you by a creative team headed by Spec Ops: The Line's Cory Davis and Nine Inch Nails' Robin Finck. This video is narrated by Creative Lead Louise Blain and Finck, the Co-Creative Director. It will be released on December 2 for PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2446540/SLEEP_AWAKE/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Sleep Awake: Official Gameplay Trailer (by NIN's Robin Finck and Spec Ops: The Line's Cory Davis)

author: IGN
description:
From Nintendo Voice Chat episode 785: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LHeJNcFGDIg

The crew shares their impressions of Dragon Quest 1&2 HD-2D Remake and PowerWash Simulator 2! Hear what makes the new HD-2D style shine, how the updated combat compares to the classics, and why PowerWash Simulator 2 is surprisingly satisfying. 

00:00 - PowerWash Simulator 2
08:57 - Dragon Quest 1&2 HD-2D Remake
09:45 - Nintendo Music
title: Dragon Quest 1&2 Remake and PowerWash Simulator 2 Impressions – NVC Clips

author: IGN
description:
Predator: Badlands is a very different tone and feel to what's gone before. There are jokes, slapstick comedy, and there's a cutesy sidekick. 

It is a big swing for the Predator franchise, so we spoke to the Predator: Badlands Director, Dan Trachtenberg, about why he decided to go in this direction for the Predator series.

#IGN #PredatorBadlands #Predator
title: Why Predator: Badlands Needed to Be Something Different - Director Explains

author: IGN
description:
Wreckreation reviewed by Luke Reilly on PC. Also available on Xbox Series X|S and PlayStation 5.

Overflowing with ambition but ultimately plain and with no style to call its own, Wreckreation feels like a supermarket brand homage to a series of better arcade racers, built with the user-generated content tools of another game. While slamming into my opponents rewarded me with snapshots of an arcade racer that’s fast and engaging for seconds at a time, any buzz I gleaned was quickly snuffed out by unpredictable handling, a dull open-world map, samey event structure, and an assortment of annoying design choices and bugs.
title: Wreckreation Review
